name: unveldom

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cprb), wcel(cuni(cdm(c0)), cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cprb), wcel(c0, cprb))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Prob → ⋃ dom(c0)∈ dom(c0))
⊣ (c0 ∈ Prob → c0 ∈ Prob)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cprb), wcel(cuni(cdm(c0)), cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cprb), wcel(c0, cprb))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Prob → ⋃ dom(c0)∈ dom(c0))
⊣ (c0 ∈ Prob → c0 ∈ Prob)

comment: The universe is an element of the domain of the probability, the universe (entire probability space) being ` U. dom P ` in our construction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Jan-2017.)
